titles.title: Federal Employees and Retirees with Delinquent Tax Debt Initiative (FERDI) Act
Federal Employees and Retirees with Delinquent Tax Debt Initiative (FERDI) Act
A bill to require an annual report of Federal employees and retirees with delinquent tax debt.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Federal Employees and Retirees with Delinquent Tax Debt Initiative (FERDI) Act
This bill directs the Internal Revenue Service to submit to specified congressional committees and make public online an annual report on current and retired federal civilian and military employees who have delinquent tax debt or an unfiled tax return for the most recent fiscal year.
